issues.title: Hardcoded Avatar URL
issues.description: The avatar uses a hardcoded URL.  This should be dynamic, based on user data or a more robust placeholder.

issues.title: Missing Error Handling
issues.description: The `renderMessageContent` function does not handle potential errors when accessing `message.value` or `message.value.name`.  This could lead to unexpected crashes or errors in the UI.

issues.title: Inconsistent className Usage
issues.description: The `className` attribute in `AvatarImage` is empty.  Consider removing the attribute or using it consistently with other components.

issues.title: Unnecessary `isLoading` prop in UserMessage
issues.description: The `isLoading` prop is passed to `UserMessage` but only used conditionally within `renderMessageContent`. This could be simplified by only passing `isLoading` when needed.

issues.title: Lack of Accessibility Considerations
issues.description: The code lacks alt text or aria labels for some elements which could impact accessibility for users with disabilities. The `AvatarFallback` particularly needs more descriptive text.

feedback: The code is generally well-structured and readable, but improvements can be made to handle errors, improve accessibility, and make the avatar URL more dynamic.  Consider adding more robust error handling and making use of more descriptive alt text.
